name: Harvest Hop
description:
Small casual physics game with rogue-lite elements made for the Ludum Dare 52 theme "Harvest". Made under 48 hours in GDevelop.

All graphics and sounds made by me.

Controls: just the mouse!

Beat the level score with a surplus to have extra points and beat levels you fail to score.

Reach high scores and other milestones to unlock new vegetables and try to further beat your best.

Use the "Restart" button to save your progress.
